mapper.select: SELECT toStartOfDay(inputdatetime) time, COUNT(*) num FROM lab_mon.warningrecord WHERE id IN ( #{param.yearMonth} ) and inputdatetime >= #{startTime} and inputdatetime <= #{endTime} group by toStartOfDay(inputdatetime) ORDER BY time

select * from lab_mon.warningrecord where hospitalcode = #{hospitalCode} order by inputdatetime DESC
limit ${count}
SELECT equipmentno, COUNT(*) num FROM lab_mon.warningrecord WHERE inputdatetime >= #{param.startTime} and inputdatetime <= #{param.endTime} GROUP BY equipmentno order BY num DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT * FROM lab_mon.warningrecord WHERE formatDateTime ( inputdatetime, '%Y-%m-%d' ) = #{ymd} AND equipmentno IN ( SELECT equipmentno FROM ( SELECT equipmentno, formatDateTime ( MAX( inputdatetime ), '%Y-%m-%d' ) time1 FROM lab_mon.warningrecord WHERE hospitalcode = #{hospitalCode} GROUP BY equipmentno ORDER BY time1 ) WHERE time1 = #{ymd} ) AND hospitalcode = #{hospitalCode}
SELECT hospitalcode, equipmentno, COUNT(instrumentparamconfigno) num FROM lab_mon.warningrecord WHERE id IN (#{time}) GROUP BY hospitalcode, equipmentno ORDER BY hospitalcode
